entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
